Html:
Most important: Is there any news on support for removing / updating compiled templates? 

Once compiled , currently a template can not be updated anymore.

Also removing compiled templates is missing.

 

Less important (because workaround possible with typed model) support for nested anonymous types? It keeps telling me, that property X is unknown, but when I define a class for it, everything works fine.
I had the same problem, but found a way to fix it. I have upload a Patch. Hope you can use it.
